TopicTitle: radial decoupler issue, engine placement is flaky

Articles.Content:
This happens on both the 32 and 64 bit version, I have For Science and Chatterer installed.

I can't seem to get my engines to sit properly on the radial decouplers, they are always inside the engines just enough to not eject (they explode but the engines stay attached). I've tried the offset and it works a little, but not enough. I hope there is an easy answer!
While placing them the mouse has to be on the decoupler. Right now you have attached the SRBs on the tank below the decoupler.
